EmailTemplate.name: Training Reschedule Exam
EmailTemplate.subject: Your {!spExams__User_Exam__c.spExams__Exam__c} Exam Info
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!spExams__User_Exam__c.spExams__First_Name__c} ,
We have rescheduled the {!spExams__User_Exam__c.User_Exam_Name__c} exam for you.
You have 3 chances in total to clear the exam. To start the exam please click on the below link.
https://c2s.my.salesforce.com/apex/IND_Training_PageReferenceLanding_Page?id={!spExams__User_Exam__c.Training_ID__c}
Regards, Industrial BU Admin
